//comment0: For the format of the metadata of your raw table.
//comment1: Use attributes name or 'ALL' as keys.
//comment2: The followings are available values and their use, type=object.
//comment3: We focus on one table first, i.e.input: a messy table, output: a clean table.

null.ra: Replace null by the average of the rest, type=str.
null.rn: Replace null by a random number follows the normal distribution, type=str.
null.rm: Replace null by the mode of the rest, type=str.

cat.attributes names: Concatenate them into one attribute, type=array.

trim.attributes names: Keep them and drop the rest attributes, type=array
